installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /tmp || exit
echo "running: curl -sSL -o samp.tar.gz http://files.sa-mp.com/samp037svr_${VERSION}.tar.gz"
curl -sSL -o samp.tar.gz http://files.sa-mp.com/samp037svr_"${VERSION}".tar.gz
echo "####################################################"
echo "> Launching SA-MP Server.(Powered by Team Codroid)"
echo "####################################################"

mkdir -p /mnt/server
tar -xzvf samp.tar.gz --strip-components=1 -C /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server || exit

sed -i '3d' /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "rcon_password ${RCON_PASS}" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg

sed -i '3d' /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "maxplayers ${MAX_PLAYERS}" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg

sed -i '3d' /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "output 1" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server


## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "#########################################"
echo "> Codroid Panel: Start your server now"
echo "#########################################"
